formulas.name: DataTable_Label
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!var_OLScreenType}, "AKAD"), "Dokumen atau syarat yang harus dipenuhi dan/ atau dibawa pada saat akad kredit.", "Dokumen atau syarat yang harus dipenuhi setelah aktivasi kontrak")

formulas.name: funcS_isSPAJKvalid
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Application.Survey__r.Life_Insurance_Type__c}, "Uninsured") == TRUE || ISPICKVAL({!Get_Application.Loan_Information__r.Product_Type__c}, "Flexi-Biz") == TRUE || {!Get_Application.Loan_Information__r.Account.RecordType.DeveloperName} == "Company", TRUE, IF({!Get_SPAJK.Approval_Status__c}=='REJECTED', TRUE, IF( {!Get_SPAJK.Approval_Status__c}=='APPROVED', IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_SPAJK.Cover_Note_Expired_At__c})),{!Get_SPAJK.Cover_Note_Expired_At__c}> TODAY()),TRUE,FALSE), FALSE)))
